problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was sitting alone in the cafeteria when a Greek guy and a Sri Lankan guy sat down on either side of me. I had to angle myself towards the Greek guy because the other clearly hadn't put on any deodorant that day.
Question: Who smells bad?
ans0: The Greek guy
ans1: The Sri Lankan guy
ans2: Can't answer
